column4: I have a very strange problem with my internet connection. Anyone wanna help?
a ethernet connection with static ip
A whole bunch of them, actually I have a thread on the subject... http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=364916
Everything is set up the way it's supposed to be (I think), but it just doesn' work
enter in the information that you need to get your eth0 to work correctly
Yes, it's there. It's been there all the time. The correct information the way it is in my ISP papers and that work under windows
yes, my DNS servers are also correct
what are you not sure about?
neither am I! I shouldn't be having any problems. It's so strange
thanks for your help, please reply in the forums if you think of something. I'm going. Bye
